# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="bd954-102">Ändra språk, datum och tidsformat eller tidszon i Outlook på webben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="bd954-103">Högst upp på sidan väljer du</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="bd954-104">**Inställningar** > **Visa alla Outlook-inställningar**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="bd954-105">Välj **Allmänt** > **språk och allmän tid**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="bd954-106">Välj det språk du vill använda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="bd954-107">Välj **Spara**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bd954-108">Mer information finns [i Ändra tidszons- och språkinställningar i Outlook på webben](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bd954-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
